nodes.text: Gold Squadron was a Jedi starfighter squadron active in 44 ABY. Gold Squadron's Jedi pilots flew StealthX starfighters.

Gold Squadron, led by Jedi Master Kyle Katarn, fought in the battle against the Lost Tribe of Sith and Ship over Nam Chorios. During the combat, Jedi Knight Raynar Thul was shot down and forced to eject. Nevertheless, Thul continued to use the Force to guide a shadow bomb he had fired, and it detonated, damaging Ship as the Meditation Sphere fled.
